page.title: 06WOOLAVINGTON 1920's
page.content: Q.When were you born? A.1892 Q.What games did you have when you were small? A.I played the same games as I see you play today:skipping,five-stones,marbles.One of my favourite games was the whipping top. Q.What entertainment was there? A.I liked listening to the wireless and on a nice day going for a picnic. At the village hall we had a band for dancing. Q.What sort of illness did the children get? A.Diphtheria,chicken-pox,mumps.You don't hear of diphtheria today. Q.How old were you when you left home? A.13 years old. Q.what was your first job? A.I was in service at The Grange.
